ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package angel food cake mix
1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed

cookingTips: Don't grease the angel food pan - the batter needs to grip the sides to rise properly
Use the pineapple juice as part of the liquid for the cake mix
Invert the pan immediately after baking to cool upside down for proper structure
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the user the unique requirements of angel food cake baking and cooling.
